body:
What is your favourite Nexus map?

Mine is Candoria.

Post now!

title: Nexus Maps

replies.body: Hmm... it would probably be Canyon I think its called.
replies.body_tagged: Hmm... it would probably be Canyon I think its called.

replies.body:
I like that Snow map which the giant pillars and wooden bridges.

Forgot what it's called, but I like how it provides flat land for PvP while still having alternate routes, all in a lovely snowy world.
But it's easy to spawnkill on that map, which isn't good.
